explanation: Olympus Mons (a volcano), Phobos (a moon), Curiosity (a rover), and Valles Marineris (a canyon system) are all distinct features or objects associated with the planet Mars. Triton is a moon of Neptune.

category: Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
explanation: All items except the Great Wall of China are traditionally listed as one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. The Great Wall is an ancient marvel but not part of that specific list.
Four of the words (Neighbor, Weight, Sleigh, Freight) contain the specific letter sequence 'EIGH'. 'Light' contains 'IGH' but does not include the 'E'.
